HOME.SLOGAN: We don't follow the map, we create new routes with you.
HOME.ABOUT_US_DESC: At Leones de Ruta, we specialize in personalized tours across Chile. With a focus on small groups, we provide authentic, safe, and adventure-filled experiences.
HOME.QUICK_CONTACT_DESC: Contact us and we will respond within 24 hours.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.

FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Unique experiences across Chile. Explore, relax, and discover new routes with us.
